Reference

get market data

getmd()

get market data

getmd_symbol()

get symbols of market data

getmd_index_cons()

get constituent of securities index

get financial reports

getfr()

get financial reports and indicators

get economic data

geted_nbs()

get economic data from National Bureau of Statistics of China (NBS)

geted_nbs_region()

get code of subregion in China from NBS

geted_nbs_symbol()

get symbol of China economic indicator from NBS

ped viz, index

ped_index()

create an index

ped_plot()

create a chart for timeseries data

country, currency, exchange

code_country

country code list

code_currency

currency code list

exchange_commodity

commodity exchanges list

exchange_stock

stock exchanges list
